description:
Lina`s party gets to a town and gets the information that a copy of the Bible is on the trophy which is given to the winner of a magic tennis competition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bitter Curve Balls! Gutsy Fast Balls!
La vengeance magique ! (Du caractère en un éclair !)
Urami no Makyuu! Konjou no Gousokkyuu!
恨みの魔球! 根性の豪速球!
